lectures.title: Bhakti Supremacy: Why Pure Devotion Surpasses All Other Paths
lectures.takeaway: Krishna declares that among all types of yogis - karma yogis, jnana yogis, and ashtanga yogis - the bhakta who worships Him with love and faith (shraddha) is the yuktatama (highest yogi).
lectures.summary_short: Among all yogis, the devotee who worships Krishna with faith and love is the highest.
